Articles.Content: Currently working on a Skylon inspired SSTO. Love the new update so far.

Your bandwidth needs moar boosters.

I am very impateintly waiting through the download. I may have to just make the steam switch. :v

KSP Store is dead.

In other news, scientists have found that Earth orbits the Sun.

OH MY GOD!

It was only a 20 minute wait, and now it's 48 minutes.

Stupid bandwidth limitations...

As I'm typing this, it jumps to one hour... ugh...
The waiting room made it to 4th in all time replies for general KSP Discussion.

I, on the other hand, ran patcher, and it updated me to... 0.22.

And the main download page is down for me too. Sigh.
And their server crashed.
Yup. Patcher is like "Nope." on my end too.

Yup. Patcher is like "Nope." on my end too.

The patcher issue is known and it is being fixed
Lets never announce the release date again, shall we?
Maybe we could re-open the Waiting Room...since some of us will be waiting patiently for a little while yet.

Launcher crashes when I try to update, and the website wont let me on. I'm slightly disappointed that SQUAD has again failed to realise how many players are attempting to download the game, leaving many of us unable to download. I'm gonna wait a bit, try again in a few hours.

I'm at school D: I'll start a new career and cop all my previous kerbinauts in (the majority of them are in my sig ).

Start fresh!
These Rapiers are fun and they look slick too!
IT LET ME IN.....and wont download.
Not shabby at all. 15 minutes to download from the store, nice and clean!

Launcher crashes when I try to update, and the website wont let me on. I'm slightly disappointed that SQUAD has again failed to realise how many players are attempting to download the game, leaving many of us unable to download. I'm gonna wait a bit, try again in a few hours.

The patcher should be working now, restart your current KSP to force a fresh download of the patcher

Back up. Mine downloaded in 4 minutes.

Thanks Squad.
Performance on my PC is way better, thanks a lot for this patch!

Ok, I apologise for my rant! In the words of that kid from the movie we all want to forget:

'Its working! ITS WORKING!'

I was originally trying to land on Ike with .22 before going to .23, but the excitement was so big...

And here am I with .23 in hand.
I'm having a problem with the game after updating. I can't get the physics warp warning to go away. The OK button seems to do nothing and I can't continue.
Booyah. Fresh version. Clean and mean.
My fps has dropped around 80%. Im getting 20fps in kerbin with a <20part ship...

The patcher should be working now, restart your current KSP to force a fresh download of the patcher

Ah, fantastic! Just in time for my copy from the store to finish downloading.
